channel.title: To make friends with time by my writing on Home
channel.description: Recent content in To make friends with time by my writing on Home

item.title: Devouring lovers and a Christmas market
item.description: Today is the first day in December and I went outside to visit the Hamburger Bahnhof Gallery and the WeihnachtsZauber Gendarmenmarkt Christmas Market. The “Devouring Lovers” exhibition by Eva Fàbregas is now going on in Hamburger Bahnhof Gallery and here are some photos I shot there today.

item.title: Dynamic programming
item.description: The essential idea of dynamic programming is to save the result for future use. For example, if I have already know 1+2+3 equals 6 and saved the result at a place, then when I have to calculate 1+2+3+4, I just have to calculate 6+4 instead of going from scratch.

item.title: Who should be the manager
item.description: I watched “Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse” today. It is an entertaining film. Excellent video effects, and, especially, the surprising but wonderful combination of various versions of spider-men based on the Spider-Verse theory.

item.title: What I will post on my blog
item.description: I have finished building my personal blog recently and now any post can be smoothly published. So immediately the next comes to me is what will I post on my blog?

item.title: I do not need to go through it again
item.description: If I had a chance to lead a new life in my high school time, what would I do? Such a question came to me today when I was playing Persona 4 Golden and reading a detective story called “体育館の殺人” by 青崎有吾.
